motd: A minor update, but with a nice quality of life improvement: Loading state for downloading Sonarr releases! This should help prevent users from accidentally triggering multiple downloads of the same release.

changes: Ability to copy your user and device ID via the help prompt (device ID can be copied without being logged in)
If a Sonarr episode has not aired, show it as "Unaired" instead of "Not Downloaded"
Added loading state to download buttons to prevent triggering multiple downloads of the same release
Changed "Upcoming" to "Unaired" to match episode list
